Title: A Passed Torch
Description:
<Strategic documents are scattered around Lyandris. Notes detailing experiments and future assault locations covering many of them.> 

<It would be of great use to your allies to find more of these documents. Thinning out the Flame's numbers wouldn't hurt either.>
ObjectivesText: Collect documents & kill Druids of the Flame within the Smoldering Copse.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Solarys at the Central Encampment.
